'''Genius Invokation TCG''' is a trading card game originating from [[Sumeru]]. It is popular in [[Inazuma]], having been brought there by [[Liben]] at the behest of a researcher from Sumeru.<ref>{{Ref/NPC|Liben|condition=during [[Marvelous Merchandise/2021-12-27]]}}</ref>
